meanings: 실용회화-관계가 안 좋을 때 I'm fed up with you. I hate you!
a hateful seven-year-old, a naughty seven-year-old
affection from hatred, affection from love

phrases.phrase: 미운 아이[놈] 떡 하나 더 준다
meanings: give one more tteok, rice cake, to a hateful child[guy]
